channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Border app that became ‘a salvation’ for migrants to legally enter the US may end
item.description: The CBP One app has brought nearly 1 million people to the U.S. on two-year permits with eligibility to work since January 2023, but it could end unde...

item.title: Kristi Noem, Trump's pick for homeland security, set to face senators
item.description: South Dakota Gov. Kristi Noem​, President-elect Donald Trump's pick to lead the sprawling Department of Homeland Security, is set to field questions f...

item.title: Driver in Texas migrant smuggling run that led to the deaths of 53 people pleads guilty
Trump's cabinet pick for Homeland Security is Kristi Noem. Here's what to know
item.description: If confirmed, Noem would lead the department poised to be at the center of Trump's immigration policy priorities, including any deportation efforts, v...

item.title: Russia jails lawyers who acted for late opposition leader Alexei Navalny
item.description: The trio were arrested as authorities intensified pressure on the jailed Kremlin critic, who died last February.

item.title: Trump wants to cut taxes. So do governors and lawmakers in some states
Why police baby killers are still not on trial seven years on
item.description: Seven years after Samantha Pendo's death her parents are still waiting for the trial of officers to begin.

item.title: Acting legend Dame Joan Plowright dies at 95
item.description: She was one of Britain's most acclaimed stage and screen stars and the widow of Sir Laurence Olivier.

item.title: A polar vortex is set to grip much of the U.S. What does that mean?
item.description: Bundle up and prepare: People living "basically anywhere from the Rockies eastward" will see extremely cold temperatures over the next several days, a...

item.title: Some Los Angeles homes made it through the firestorm. Here's how
item.description: Houses are still standing in the burn zone in Los Angeles, ones that made it through the fires. Experts on the ground are finding those homeowners mad...

item.title: Who is China sending to Trump's inauguration?
item.description: This is the first time a senior Chinese leader will witness a US president being sworn in.

item.title: NYC Mayor Eric Adams meeting with Trump at Mar-a-Lago today
item.description: NYC Mayor Eric Adams is meeting with President-elect Donald Trump at his Mar-a-Lago home Friday in Florida.

item.title: Biden sets presidential pardons, commutations record with alost 2,500 more
item.description: President Biden says he's commuting the sentences of almost 2,500 people convicted of nonviolent drug offenses. That gives him the presidential record...

item.title: Development is taking a toll on Florida's precious springs
item.description: The state has been slow to adopt rules to protect Florida's endangered springs. While a boom in residential construction has increased the amount of g...

item.title: Russia sentences Alexey Navalny's lawyers to years in prison
item.description: Russia sentenced three lawyers who had defended Alexei Navalny to several years in prison for sharing his messages from prison with the outside world.

item.title: Drone footage shows fire at one of world's largest battery plants
item.description: The Moss Landing power plant, in California, was evacuated, as were people in the surrounding area.

item.title: As Biden exits, how will he be remembered for his handling of the U.S. economy?
item.description: The economy rebounded strongly from the COVID shock, but the U.S. continues to grapple with a cost-of-living crisis and spiraling federal debt.

item.title: What's next for Kamala Harris
